+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<!DOCTYPE hibernate-mapping PUBLIC "-//Hibernate/Hibernate Mapping DTD//EN" "http://hibernate.sourceforge.net/hibernate-mapping-3.0.dtd">
+
+<hibernate-mapping>
+    <class name="com.opensymphony.workflow.spi.hibernate.HibernateWorkflowEntry" table="OS_WFENTRY">
+        <id name="id" unsaved-value="-1">
+            <generator class="native"/>
+        </id>
+
+		<version name="version"/>
+
+        <property name="workflowName" column="name"/>
+        <property name="state"/>
+
+        <bag name="currentSteps" cascade="all-delete-orphan" lazy="true" inverse="true">
+            <key column="entry_Id"/>
+            <!-- index column="stepIndex"/-->
+            <one-to-many class="com.opensymphony.workflow.spi.hibernate.HibernateCurrentStep"/>
+        </bag>
+
+        <bag name="historySteps" cascade="all" lazy="true" inverse="true">
+            <key column="entry_Id"/>
+            <!-- index column="stepIndex"/-->
+            <one-to-many class="com.opensymphony.workflow.spi.hibernate.HibernateHistoryStep"/>
+        </bag>
+
+    </class>
+</hibernate-mapping>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!DOCTYPE workflow PUBLIC "-//OpenSymphony Group//DTD OSWorkflow 2.8//EN" "http://www.opensymphony.com/osworkflow/workflow_2_8.dtd">
+<!--
+  Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
+  you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
+  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+
+       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+
+  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+  distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+  limitations under the License.
+-->
+<workflow>
+    <initial-actions>
+        <action name="start" id="0">
+            <validators>
+                <validator type="class">
+                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.CheckIfUserIdAlreadyExists</arg>
+                </validator>
+            </validators>
+            <pre-functions>
+                <function type="class">
+                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.StoreUserIdAsCaller</arg>
+                </function>
+            </pre-functions>
+            <results>
+                <unconditional-result old-status="n/a" status="creationRequest" step="1"/>
+            </results>
+        </action>
+    </initial-actions>
+    <common-actions>
+        <action name="reset" id="100">
+            <results>
+                <unconditional-result old-status="n/a" status="creationRequest" step="1"/>
+            </results>
+        </action>
+    </common-actions>
+    <steps>
+        <step name="creationRequest" id="1">
+            <pre-functions>
+                <function type="class">
+                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.StoreUserIdAsCaller</arg>
+                </function>
+            </pre-functions>
+            <actions>
+                <action name="create" id="1001">
+                    <results>
+                        <result old-status="creationRequest" status="active" step="3">
+                            <conditions type="AND">
+                                <condition type="class">
+                                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.IsMobileApplication</arg>
+                                </condition>
+                            </conditions>
+                            <post-functions>
+                                <function type="class">
+                                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.SendSMSText</arg>
+                                </function>
+                                <function type="class">
+                                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.StoreActivationDate</arg>
+                                </function>
+                            </post-functions>
+                        </result>
+                        <unconditional-result old-status="creationRequest" status="doubleOptIn" step="2"/>
+                    </results>
+                    <post-functions>
+                        <function type="class">
+                            <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.SendEmail</arg>
+                        </function>
+                        <!-- TMP -->
+                        <function type="class">
+                            <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.OpenAMCreate</arg>
+                        </function>
+                    </post-functions>
+                </action>
+            </actions>
+        </step>
+        <step name="doubleOptIn" id="2">
+            <pre-functions>
+                <function type="class">
+                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.StoreUserIdAsCaller</arg>
+                </function>
+            </pre-functions>
+            <actions>
+                <common-action id="100"/>
+
+                <action name="activate" id="2001">
+                    <results>
+                        <result old-status="doubleOptIn" status="active" step="3">
+                            <conditions type="AND">
+                                <condition type="class">
+                                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.IsValidToken</arg>
+                                </condition>
+                            </conditions>
+                            <post-functions>
+                                <function type="class">
+                                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.StoreActivationDate</arg>
+                                </function>
+                            </post-functions>
+                        </result>
+                        <unconditional-result old-status="doubleOptIn" status="doubleOptIn" step="2"/>
+                    </results>
+                </action>
+            </actions>
+        </step>
+        <step name="active" id="3">
+            <pre-functions>
+                <function type="class">
+                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.StoreUserIdAsCaller</arg>
+                </function>
+                <!-- TMP -->
+                <function type="class">
+                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.OpenAMActivate</arg>
+                </function>
+            </pre-functions>
+            <actions>
+                <action name="subscribe" id="301">
+                    <results>
+                        <unconditional-result old-status="active" status="active" step="3"/>
+                    </results>
+                </action>
+                <action name="unsubscribe" id="302">
+                    <results>
+                        <unconditional-result old-status="active" status="active" step="3"/>
+                    </results>
+                </action>
+                <action name="update" id="303">
+                    <results>
+                        <unconditional-result old-status="active" status="active" step="3"/>
+                    </results>
+                </action>
+                <action name="passwordReset" id="304">
+                    <results>
+                        <unconditional-result old-status="active" status="active" step="3"/>
+                    </results>
+                </action>
+                <action name="suspend" id="305">
+                    <results>
+                        <unconditional-result old-status="active" status="suspended" step="4"/>
+                    </results>
+                </action>
+                <action name="delete" id="306">
+                    <results>
+                        <unconditional-result old-status="active" status="deleted" step="5"/>
+                    </results>
+                </action>
+            </actions>
+        </step>
+        <step name="suspended" id="4">
+            <pre-functions>
+                <function type="class">
+                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.StoreUserIdAsCaller</arg>
+                </function>
+            </pre-functions>
+            <actions>
+                <action name="reactivate" id="401">
+                    <results>
+                        <unconditional-result old-status="suspended" status="active" step="3"/>
+                    </results>
+                </action>
+            </actions>
+        </step>
+        <step name="deleted" id="5">
+            <pre-functions>
+                <function type="class">
+                    <arg name="class.name">org.syncope.core.workflow.prcsiam.StoreUserIdAsCaller</arg>
+                </function>
+            </pre-functions>
+            <actions>
+                <common-action id="100"/>
+            </actions>
+        </step>
+    </steps>
+</workflow>
